attributes.action: Re-open the the trainline from Barnstaple to Okehampton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-open the trainline from Barnstaple to Okehampton via Torrington and then on to Plymouth for economic and health & safety reasons. The South Devon railway is a liabilty at this time of year. The train network co-operates with
environmental worth, especially on a twin track basis with freight capability. If the trainline co-exists with the cycle-path it will be even better.
